verses.verse: I <S%H157>love<s%> the <S%H3068>Lord<s%>, because he has <S%H8085>heard<s%> my <S%H6963>voice<s%> and my <S%H8469>supplications<s%>.
Because he has <S%H5186>inclined<s%> his <S%H241>ear<s%> unto <S%H7121>me<s%>, therefore will I call upon him as long as I <S%H3117>live<s%>.

The <S%H2256>sorrows<s%> of <S%H4194>death<s%> <S%H661>surrounded<s%> <S%H4712>me<s%>, and the pains of <S%H7585>hell<s%> got a <S%H4672>hold<s%> on <S%H4672>me<s%>: I found <S%H6869>trouble<s%> and <S%H3015>sorrow<s%>.
Then <S%H7121>called<s%> I upon the <S%H8034>name<s%> of the <S%H3068>Lord<s%>; O <S%H3068>Lord<s%>, I <S%H577>beg<s%> <S%H4422>you<s%>, deliver my <S%H5315>soul<s%>.
<S%H2587>Gracious<s%> is the <S%H3068>Lord<s%>, and <S%H6662>righteous<s%>; <S%H430>Yes<s%>, our God is <S%H7355>merciful<s%>.
The <S%H3068>Lord<s%> <S%H8104>preserves<s%> the <S%H6612>simple<s%>: I was brought <S%H1809>low<s%>, and he helped <S%H3467>me<s%>.
<S%H7725>Return<s%> unto your <S%H4494>rest<s%>, O my <S%H5315>soul<s%>; for the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> has dealt bountifully with <S%H1580>you<s%>.
For you have <S%H2502>delivered<s%> my <S%H5315>soul<s%> from <S%H4194>death<s%>, my <S%H5869>eyes<s%> from <S%H1832>tears<s%>, and my <S%H7272>feet<s%> from <S%H1762>falling<s%>.
I will <S%H1980>walk<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> in the <S%H776>land<s%> of the <S%H2416>living<s%>.
I <S%H539>believed<s%>, therefore have I <S%H1696>spoken<s%>: I was <S%H3966>greatly<s%> <S%H6031>afflicted<s%>:
What shall I <S%H7725>render<s%> unto the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> for all his benefits toward <S%H8408>me<s%>?
I will <S%H5375>take<s%> the <S%H3563>cup<s%> of <S%H3444>salvation<s%>, and <S%H7121>call<s%> upon the <S%H8034>name<s%> of the <S%H3068>Lord<s%>.
I will <S%H7999>pay<s%> my <S%H5088>vows<s%> unto the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> now in the presence of all his <S%H5971>people<s%>.
<S%H3368>Precious<s%> in the <S%H5869>sight<s%> of the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> is the <S%H4194>death<s%> of his <S%H2623>saints<s%>.

O <S%H3068>Lord<s%>, <S%H577>truly<s%> I am your <S%H5650>servant<s%>; I am your <S%H5650>servant<s%>, and the <S%H1121>son<s%> of your <S%H519>handmaid<s%>: you have <S%H6605>loosened<s%> my <S%H4147>bonds<s%>.
I will <S%H2076>offer<s%> to you the <S%H2077>sacrifice<s%> of <S%H8426>thanksgiving<s%>, and will <S%H7121>call<s%> upon the <S%H8034>name<s%> of the <S%H3068>Lord<s%>.
I will <S%H7999>pay<s%> my <S%H5088>vows<s%> unto the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> now in the presence of all his <S%H5971>people<s%>,
In the <S%H2691>courts<s%> of the <S%H3068>Lord<s%>'s <S%H1004>house<s%>, in the <S%H8432>middle<s%> of <S%H3389>you<s%>, O Jerusalem. <S%H1984>Praise<s%> you the <S%H3050>Lord<s%>.
